title: CLANNAD After Story (Dub)
alternative_title: CLANNAD〜AFTER STORY〜 クラナド アフターストーリー
description: Events in After Story take place immediately after the first season, following Tomoya's final semester of high school. After declaring his love to Nagisa, they begin to have a close relationship. Their life together will be faced with unexpected challenges, as the truth behind the illusionary world and the city's legend come to light.
genre: [<Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Romance>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>, <Genre -> Supernatural>]
